channel.title: Data Mining on Columbia DSI Scholars
channel.description: Recent content in Data Mining on Columbia DSI Scholars

item.title: Project: Enhancing self-directed learning opportunities
item.description: Analyze data from one of the following library applications/systems and create visualizations that highlight the most important findings pertaining to the support of self-directed learning: Vialogues (TC Video Discussion Application), PocketKnowledge (TC Online Archive), DocDel (E-Reserve System), Pressible (Blogging Platform), Library Website and Mobile App.

item.title: Project: Internships in DSI Center for Data, Media & Society
item.description: The DSI Center for Data, Media & Society is seeking undergraduate and masters students during the summer to work on projects at the intersection of Computer Science, Data Science, and the humanities. These projects will combine domain expertise in the humanities with computer and data science techniques to tackle important societal and media problems.
